org.frc.team4572.LIDAR

Class Lidar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.frc.team4572.LIDAR.Lidar

  • public class Lidar
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the library for use of the LIDAR lite v3 over PWM connection. See the 2018 wikiCode for a tutorial on how to use it.

      • setCalibrationOffset

        public void setCalibrationOffset(int offset)
        Offsets the distance recorded by the LIDAR in order to calibrate it.
        Parameters:
        offset - is the offset wanted
